text: Johnny Barnes (born John James Randolf Adolphus Mills, June 23, 1923 - July 9, 2016) was a Bermudian entertainer. He was known for waving to passing traffic at the Foot of the Lane roundabout in Hamilton, Bermuda. He became so loved and well known that the government of Bermuda created a statue of Barnes and be placed in Hamilton. Barnes died on July 9, 2016 in Hamilton, aged 93. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Bermudian entertainers
title: Johnny Barnes
